org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Interface ComputingElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchComputingElement, SimpleComputingElement

    public interface ComputingElement
extends java.lang.Runnable
    This interface defined the functionality of a ComputingElement (CE), which processes GridJobs.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean active()
      The current state of the CE.
      JobHandler getJobHandler()
      Method that returns a CE's job handler
      GridSite getSite()
      The site this CE is on.
      Statistics getStatistics() 
      int getWorkerNodes()
      The number of worker nodes this CE has.
      boolean iAm(int index)
      Method to expose CE's ID by a simple test.
      void pauseCE()
      GUI calls this method to pause the ComputingElement threads when pause button is pressed.
      void shutDownCE()
      The ResourceBroker calls this method when it has distributed all the jobs to shut down the ComputingElement threads.
      void unpauseCE()
      GUI calls this method to unpause the ComputingElement threads when continue button is pressed.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

      • getSite

        The site this CE is on.
        Returns:
        The site this CE is on.

      • getWorkerNodes

        int getWorkerNodes()
        The number of worker nodes this CE has.
        Returns:
        number of worker nodes

      • active

        boolean active()
        The current state of the CE.
        Returns:
        true if CE is running a job, false otherwise;

      • pauseCE

        void pauseCE()
        GUI calls this method to pause the ComputingElement threads when pause button is pressed.

      • unpauseCE

        void unpauseCE()
        GUI calls this method to unpause the ComputingElement threads when continue button is pressed.

      • getStatistics

        Statistics getStatistics()
        Returns:
        The percentage of time the ce was running jobs.

      • getJobHandler

        JobHandler getJobHandler()
        Method that returns a CE's job handler
        Returns:
        The JobHandler for this CE

      • iAm

        boolean iAm(int index)
        Method to expose CE's ID by a simple test.
        Parameters:
        index - the CE ID we are looking for
        Returns:
        true if this CE is indexed by the number index

      • shutDownCE

        void shutDownCE()
        The ResourceBroker calls this method when it has distributed all the jobs to shut down the ComputingElement threads.
